body.p: To his excellency Thos E Bramlett Governor of the Commonwealth Ky petitioner your petitioners, P Lesley & Robt W Lesley was each find at the present December (1865) of the Pike circuit court each the sum of $20 -- for retailing spiriteous Liquor -- they say it was a case of necessity family sickness -- it was no intention of violation of the Laws -- we ask a remission of the fine
The undersign say that the above petitioners are good citizenmost and Law abiding -- are truely subject of the executive Clemency & do recommend them for pardon

L. C. Dils
Jno Dils Jr
Harrison Ford
John Scott
George N Brown
Jake Rice
John Shortridge
O. C. Bowles
Hubbard Williams
clerk of the Pike County ^Court^
Jno Hawkins
T Towers Dpty
K T Burns Co Atty

Pike Cir Ct
vs
P & R W. Lesley
$20, each
Tipling
Remitted 23 Dec/65
